bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Hertz Burgin (b. 1870) was the author of Die Geshiskhte fun der Idisher Arbayter Bevegung in Amerika, Rusland un England (Feraynigte idishe geverkshaften, New York, 1915), i.e.."The History of the Jewish Labor Movement.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Contains a typescript, "History of the Jewish Labor Movement," "translated from the Yiddish by a student assistant" (1962; 301 pp.).

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Donor unknown. The accession number associated with this gift is 1950.165.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions

Permission to publish or reproduce materials to which s/he holds copyright must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Tamiment Library for assistance with contacting Hertz Burgin.
